nodes.text: The Flurry II combat cloud car was an aerial vehicle manufactured by Bespin Motors.

Produced in 29 BBY, it was a brand-new model at the time. The Outer Rim Oreworks provided its security chief of Lamaredd with a shiny, bronze-colored Flurry II that he named "Brassie". In time, "Brassie" became battered and no longer shiny.
